headline: Will Hyperscale Data Center Demand and Offshore Wind Progress Reshape Dominion Energy's (D) Growth Narrative?
summary: Dominion Energy recently advanced its massive clean-energy buildout, with over US$50 billion in capital spending planned through 2029 and the Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind project now more than halfway complete, expected to power 660,000 homes by late 2026. A unique aspect of this development is the rising demand from hyperscale data centers, which is driving the company’s investment in renewables and influencing the overall clean energy transition in its core regions. We'll examine how...
